commit message: Align linkMode with client code

* Attempt to support more attachment types from WebDAV (issue 67)
* Handle attachments with no extension in title correctly
Fixing up the attachment extension code, add fallback to online when snapshot not available
'item' is translated in main zotero as 'документ' though I think 'карточка' would be better

proof of concept: WevView for notes

read-only WebView is implemented for standalone notes and for note in attachment. Default behavior was changed for attached notes. One has to long click to edit (in plain text).

Attachment key is being passed to NoteActivity

Long click to open attachment. Short click opens note.
Note is displayed for any attachment type if present in JSON.
RichText editing (no saving) via TinyMCE

Clean up for TinyMCE

TinyMCE submodule added to git
Two builders are added to eclipse: build & copy tiny_mce to assets
ZWebView subclass for WebView to suppress default behavior for arrow keys
Set status correctly for new note attachment.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/mlt/zandy
My changes to richtext-- trying a non-TinyMCE approach
Remove unneeded tinymce submodule. Add maxLines to TextView for item data.

Comment out keys override in ZWebView. Fix attachment downloading. Reorganize note editing.

* ZWebView used to block all keys with intent to manually submit codes to JavaScript. AFAIK this entire approach is currently broken. Just make the activity responsive.
* Add more space to note by moving Edit command into menu
* Fix incorrect (?) regexp
* Fix saved from page pdf handling
* Open just downloaded attachments
